newsitem.title: USA: Health Mngmt sees Q2 EPS $0.01 to $0.02.
newsitem.headline: Health Mngmt sees Q2 EPS $0.01 to $0.02.

text.p: Health Management Systems Inc said Thursday that its 1997 second quarter earnings per share will be about $0.01 to $0.02, after a one-time benefit of $0.09 per share from a favorable tax settlement with the Internal Revenue Service.
For last year's second quarter the company reported $0.18 per share.
The company said continuing revenue shortfalls contributed to the lower-that-expected earnings.
Analysts expect the company to report $0.13 per share for this year's second quarter, according to First Call.
The company said total revenue for the second quarter will be about $20.0 million.
The company said it will officially release its second quarter results May 28.
